transcript:
Agent: Hello, thank you for considering our company. My name is John, and I'm calling about our new smart home security system.
Customer: Hi John, I've been looking into security systems. What makes yours stand out?
Agent: Our system offers 24/7 monitoring, motion detection, and remote access through our mobile app.
Customer: That sounds interesting. How much does it cost?
Agent: Our basic package starts at $99 per month, with a one-time installation fee of $200.
Customer: Okay, that's a bit higher than I was expecting. Do you have any promotions?
Agent: Actually, we're running a special right now. If you sign up within the next 48 hours, we'll waive the installation fee.
Customer: That helps. What kind of equipment is included?
Agent: You'll get a control panel, three door sensors, and one motion detector.
Customer: Can I add more sensors later if I need to?
Agent: Yes, you can add additional sensors at any time. We also offer outdoor cameras and other accessories.
Customer: Okay, I think I'm interested. What's the next step?
Agent: I can send you a contract to review and sign. We'll also schedule an installation time that works for you.
Customer: Sounds good. Can you email me the contract?
Agent: I'll send it over right away. Is there a best email address to reach you at?
Customer: Yeah, it's jsmith@email.com.
Agent: Great, I'll send it to that address. We'll be in touch soon to schedule the installation.
Customer: Looking forward to it, thanks.
Agent: You're welcome, have a great day!
